entry.summary: Caffeine
entry.content:
Caffeine​

It's already morning, but i am still wide awake.
What heavy thoughts of you make
I am weary, but the thoughts of you won't stop.

entry.summary: I am obvious and surely you must know,
entry.content:
I am obvious and surely you must know,
I admire you.
And when I find the courage,
I shall speak to you all the sweetest things.
Maybe I'll sweep you off your feet,
or you can destroy all of me in just a single word.
Whatever it will be, i won't mind.
Only when I find that courage.

entry.summary: I'll marry you anywhere an altar stands,
entry.content:
I'll marry you anywhere an altar stands,
and all the white sand beaches,
With vows of loving you, old and anew
My eternal drops of morning dew.
I'll marry you everyday on our quiet gardens,
On our short dates, and long trips.
Will you go with me?

entry.summary: Banging my head into the wall,
entry.content:
Banging my head into the wall,
Troubled by things out of my control.

entry.summary: Rollercoaster
entry.content:
Rollercoaster​

To the slightest, softest whisper of your name,
my heart skips a beat and then goes twice, thrice much faster.
It's a rollercoaster.

entry.summary: I can be your bestfriend, or your lover.
entry.content:
I can be your bestfriend, or your lover.
I can be your true love, or your one-night-stand.
I can be your husband, or your paramour.
I can be your prince, or your slave.
I can be your hero.
I can be your fool.
I can be your knight in shining armour.
I can be your everything.
I can be anything you want me to be.
Just tell me what you want.

entry.summary: She's breaking my heart, every single day without halt,
entry.content:
She's breaking my heart, every single day without halt,
and the piteous thing about it is it's not even her fault.

entry.summary: If you are not to be my wife, I would rather not marry...
entry.content: If you are not to be my wife, I would rather not marry...

entry.summary: Hopeless at love, for love for me is only you.
entry.content: Hopeless at love, for love for me is only you.

entry.summary: Love me... not in this world.
entry.content:
Love me... not in this world.
Love me... not at this moment.
Love me... next time.
But please... do love me.

entry.summary: Past my thirties, I admit I feel like I'm still not ready.
entry.content:
Past my thirties, I admit I feel like I'm still not ready.
I am far from perfection, by my own standards.
I don't want to be that good guy today, and fool around ten years after.
And I've seen enough good guys turn to monsters. Most of them are friends.
Or maybe I'm just overly ambitious, always in pursuit of greatness.
Or I became too tough that I can live alone.
And maybe I'll never be perfect nor ready.
I will only have to settle on admiring you afar.

entry.summary: I have grown weary from only watching and waiting.
entry.content:
I have grown weary from only watching and waiting.
Now marks the time perfectly for some soul-searching.
And maybe... just maybe, I'll find you too.

entry.summary: Even If
entry.content:
Even If​

My love is of the greatest kind.
I love you without you knowing.
I'll love you even if you don't.

entry.summary: The darkest days of my life have arrived,
entry.content:
The darkest days of my life have arrived,
that I'm not entirely sure whether I'll survive.
And there's not even a single soul I can talk to about.
You won't even see it in my eyes.

entry.summary: Codes of Perfection I live by:
entry.content:
Codes of Perfection I live by:
Dress like James Bond. Fight like Statham.
Think like Steve Jobs. Style like Johnny Depp.
Act like a gentleman.
Write like Hank Moody. Live like Larry Crowne.
Play like Michael Jordan. Drive like Vin Diesel.
Train like The Rock. Chase the Dream,
and Beat that Zucker.

entry.summary: So it was just a dream. Still felt like so god damn real.
entry.content:
So it was just a dream. Still felt like so god damn real.
But you're too good to be true, it's surreal.
That's how I knew it's just a fucking dream, but still.
For you, I'll always be dreamin'.
Because I am a dreamer, and you are mine.
Come again, and don't ever wake me up.

entry.summary: It's such a shame the world will never know
entry.content:
It's such a shame the world will never know
How I love you deeply in the soul.

entry.summary: In a house full of drunks, and cheats and loud sound,
entry.content:
In a house full of drunks, and cheats and loud sound,
Hardly the place where love's likely to be found.
I was the lone man sober, and yet more mad,
Glued in one corner by myself, seeming odd.
While all men were looking for the easy one to fuck,
There I was a fool, waiting and looking for love.

entry.summary: I am difficult to love, but love me still.
entry.content: I am difficult to love, but love me still. 'Cause I love you more than anything and everything in between. You're my every morning's falling star. So here I am, on my favorite spot... waiting. To the fear of missing you out.

entry.summary: Why do I admire you? But why even bother asking?
entry.content:
Why do I admire you? But why even bother asking?
It's a long list of countless reasons I have already lost track of.
Maybe it is your grace, my perfect preference of a lady.
Or maybe it is your beauty, such is my eye candy.
I can give you thousand reasons more,
and while all of them would be true, the fact is, I fancy you.
And I don't even really know why.

entry.summary: Lying alone, counting stars, I swear I could've counted them all.
entry.content:
Lying alone, counting stars, I swear I could've counted them all.
But years of loving you, I am not yet done.

entry.summary: When you're deprived of love,
entry.content:
When you're deprived of love,
That is when you write.

entry.summary: We're making great art.
entry.content:
We're making great art.
And while you're breaking my heart,
I'll have you immortalized.

entry.summary: Of calm night's expressionless mystery
entry.content:
Of calm night's expressionless mystery
You're the face of a pretty scenery
Nothing more than lovelier could eclipse
What's been enthroned by the shape of thy lips
In a borrowed light, shone awe-inspiring
No other thing can be more comforting
Out of thrill by the promise of the night
You glow complement to each candlelight
As every stars behind you cast romance
In light music time's perfect for a dance
For every night, you are my sky's essence
Surely I will miss you in your absence
In touch of a dream, so near yet so far
That in your standards I remain subpar
But my admiration has not an end
Like the horizon's depth on its extend
Reaching infinity at its embrace
I'd look beyond upon search for your trace
Because without you, happiness falls short
Pages blank float, life is without a worth
And might this forever be left empty
I shall remember in my memory
Exclusively you've taken, none could fill
Preserved not even end of time could kill
For thy fairness rare is without replace
In constant state of my eyes' steady gaze
Let me wait patiently for this feature
The face of my future, in-love and demure
And for all-time be remained kept sweetest
Your memories, eternal Love's purest.
I know might you be ill to pledges by men,
Take mine for it will never be broken.

If ever your own sky abandons you
This you might know, someone out there loves you.
